conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from points A, B, and C to determine which container it will flow into.
Liquid flows from A towards the bottom left.
Liquid from A will pass through the baffle and flow into container D.
Liquid flows from B towards the bottom center.
Liquid from B will pass through the baffle and flow into container D.
Liquid flows from C towards the bottom right.
Liquid from C will pass through the baffle and flow into container E.
Liquid from A and B will flow into container D.
Liquid from C will flow into container E.
Container D will receive liquid from A and B.
Container E will receive liquid from C.
